attributes.action: enforce a minimum wage for successful graduates e.g minimum £7.50 per hour, irrespective of nature of job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is difficult for graduates to find work once they have left university due to the immense competition from other graduates. The introduction of a minimum wage for these graduates would act as a reward for completing a degree, as well as honour their status as a graduate.
